alert.note: Alert for Dawson, McCone, Prairie, Richland, Wibaux Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 02 at 2:24PM MDT until November 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG CONDITIONS LINGERING THIS AFTERNOON... .Gusty winds and low humidity near the border with North Dakota. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 122... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 122, but mainly near and south of the Yellowstone River Valley. * WIND...From the west/northwest at 25 to 30 mph with some gusts up to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...15 to 20 percent * HIGHEST THREAT...is located in Wibaux County. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly toward the east. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Dawson, McCone, Prairie, Richland, Wibaux Counties
